original_text: The prison guard did what he had been told to do. He put Paul and Silas in a room in the middle of the prison. He put their feet between big heavy pieces of wood so that they could not move their legs.
korean_text: 그가 이러한 명령을 받아 그들을 깊은 옥에 가두고 그 발을 차꼬에 든든히 채웠더니

sentences.original_text: The prison guard did what he had been told to do
sentences.korean_translation: 감옥 간수는 그에게 해달라고 말한 대로 했습니다

sentences.original_text: He put Paul and Silas in a room
in the middle of the prison
He put their feet between big heavy pieces of wood
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들의 발을 크고 무거운 나무 조각들 사이에 넣었습니다

sentences.original_text: so that they could not move their legs
